overview: Jayson Kim is currently a senior programmer with Hyundai Heavy Industries Companies. Ltd. He has over 10 years in mass analysis computational modeling and programming and over 7 years of management experience with business management information systems. Jayson Kim has extensive experience in RFID, JAVA, Oracle, RS232C, C/C++ and real-time ARM processors environments. Prior to Hyundai, Jayson Kim managed CDMA mobile fields around areas of audio path, device, noise, volume, CODEC, CMX, and Voice Path analysis for Samsung Electronics Group.
